H0.text: types of skiing in the winter olympics 2018. Downhill

H1.text: types of skiing in the winter olympics 2018. Cross-Country

H2.text: types of skiing in the winter olympics 2018. Ski Jumping

H3.text: types of skiing in the winter olympics 2018. Slalom

A4.text: Men's downhill was postponed (high winds) from 11 to 15 February.

A5.text: Men's slalom was postponed (high winds) from 14 to 16 February.

A6.text: Cross-country skiing at the 2018 Winter Olympics was held at the Alpensia Cross-Country Skiing Centre in Pyeongchang, South Korea.

A7.text: A total of 313 athletes from 65 nations (including the IOC's designation of Olympic Athletes from Russia) were scheduled to participate.
